div.style: color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 15px; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe WP", "Segoe UI WPC", Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black; font-family: Arial;

strong.span:
Governor Pritzker announced on Friday, April 17th that in reaction to the COVID-19, or coronavirus, spread in our state, he is issuing a mandated closure of all K-12 schools lasting through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.
The district webpage, Facebook pages, email, and SchoolMessenger phone calls will be our primary sources for updating parents with important information.

div.div: 501 E. Lorena Ave., Wood River, IL 62095
